# Ignore the build and intermediate files
bin/
obj/

# Ignore Visual Studio files
.vs/
.vscode/

# Ignore ASP.NET Core HTTPS certificate
https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/issues/27198
*.vspscc
.vsscc
*.user
*.userosscache
*.suo
*.userprefs

# Ignore Windows Installer files
*.cab
*.msi
*.msm
*.msp

# Ignore ASP.NET Scaffolding
Scaffolding/

# Ignore files generated by Visual Studio for debugging purposes
*.dbmdl
*.bak


# Ignore any temporary files
Thumbs.db
ehthumbs.db

# Ignore JetBrains Rider files
.idea/

# Ignore files related to macOS
.DS_Store

# Ignore JetBrains metadata files
.idea/

# Ignore files related to NuGet
*.nupkg
*.snupkg
